name: AeroGeo
description:
Inspired from Rob Brook's geometric design from his course on Udemy.

AeroGeo: stars a pilot named Benjamin Crisp. Who flies for some futuristic block government who masquerades under some altruistic values, but then realizes that his life is a lie, and decides to switch air lines, or air forces. (ha ha!) by hijacking one of the Government's prototype fighters. Crisp is determined to find his shangri-la among the cosmos, or die trying.
